folder: Pelham Parkway North & wood Avenue, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway North - Bronxwood Avenue
text:
Pelham Parkway North (vantage point, not seen), north side, east from Bronxwood Ave. to Williamsbridge Road, showing units of the New York Institute for the Education of the Blind.

August 2, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
